remarks: Value of the function mapping variables to their corresponding variable expressions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mvhfval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mvhfval.y $e |- Y = ( mType ` T ) $.
mvhfval.h $e |- H = ( mVH ` T ) $.
mvhval $p |- ( X e. V -> ( H ` X ) = <. ( Y ` X ) , <" X "> >. ) $.
